questions.question: Choose how evaluation should consume data in v2:

codeBlock.code:
Artifact-native:
  Evaluation reads/writes ArtifactRefs only.
  Truth/metrics/report are derived artifacts.
  Biggest cleanup, clearest architecture.

Mixed:
  Evaluation can use ArtifactRefs but still keeps some direct legacy builders.
  Lower migration risk, more complexity.

Legacy-first:
  Keep current eval internals and only add ArtifactStore later.
  Fastest short-term, weakest long-term architecture.
